metadata.name: MagicPiggy
metadata.description:
此卡用以纪念 WePiggy 跨链部署计划的第三步：登陆 Polygon。念诵神奇的印度魔法，开辟链通 DeFi 世界的神秘之径。持有此卡可获得由 WePiggy 加持的“神奇魔法，链通世界”状态。
This card is issued to commemorate the third step of WePiggy's cross-chain deployment plan: Polygon. Recite magical Indian mantras, open up a mysterious path connecting the DeFi world. Holder of this NFT will be blessed by WePiggy with the buff of "Magic Network, Connecting the DeFi World".
总量(Amount)：198 
品级(Level)：史诗(Epic)
